title: NFL Best WR, Crabtree/Talib Chain Snatching Suspension (Football 11/29)
description:
***Note: Special Eli Manning benching reaction podcast coming later today***
Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora link up for a mid-week edition of the Pick Six podcast! JLC starts by revealing some big UPS news, then the guys discuss the offensive offensive display between the Ravens and Texans on Monday Night, while Jason reiterates the Chiefs plan at quarterback. Next, it's time for Hot Take or Just Right, as Nick asks if Sean McVay will go down as one of the best coaches in NFL history, if John Elway will spend a top 10 pick on a quarterback, if the Chargers are going to win out, and much more! Nick and Pete wrap up by addressing suspensions handed down to Aquib Talib and Michael Crabtree, and who the best wide receiver is in the NFL right now.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
